basisSet.dc:title: DZP + Rydberg (Dunning)
basisSet.dct:abstract: DZP1R Double Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description: Dunning/Dunning-Hay DZ + Polarization + Rydberg Basis ----------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References H: (4s,1p) -> [2s,1p] T. H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 53, 2823 Li - Ne: (10s,6p,2d) -> [5s,3p,2d] (1970). Al - Cl: (12s,8p,2d) -> [7s,5p,2d] T. H. Dunning, Jr. and P. J. Hay, Methods of Electronic Structure Theory, Vol. 3, H.F. Schaefer III, Ed. Plenum Press (1977).
